name: Block Ninjas IOS and OSX Game - iPad iPhone and Mac
blurb: Block Ninjas is a 2d action plat-former for your IOS & OSX devices. Be apart of the game and help make my dreams come true.

rewards.reward: Give any amount of money, starting at $1, and receive backers-only updates here on Kickstarter with videos and screenshots and photos of me working on the game.\r\n\r\nYou can also leave comments and suggestions of awesome ways to make this game even beter! Dont also forget the warm feeling in your hearts knowing you helped make a difference in making this game and my dreams come true.
NINJA WALLPAPER - Free Block Ninjas wallpaper in different sizes for your computer, cellphone or touchscreen devices!

NINJA PAPER CRAFT DESIGNS - In addition to backers-only updates, you will receive original papercraft designs not available to the general public, emailed to you to print, fold, and cherish forever. \r\nSend Photos of your papercraft character to the secret ninja email provided and get a chance to win the game for free or a t-shirt or your picture in the credits with a special thanks in future updates of the game or on the website.

YOUR NAME IN THE GAME + SOUNDTRACK + Ringtones - All of the above, plus your name will be added to a "special thanks" section of the credits created specifically for backers. 

In addition to all previous rewards we will also email you the soundtrack to the game in MP3 format (currently estimated at 5-10 songs.) 

And free ringtones for your iphone or other smartphone in mp3 and m4r  file format.

THE NINJA SCHWAG BEGINS - Backers will get all previous rewards, plus a set of stickers with the lovable Block Ninjas plus addons for your awesome paper craft Block Ninjas. 
+ extra downloadable paper craft block ninja sets to complete your block ninja army!
+a personalized thank you card sent out to you.

Wait theres more! You will also get a secret ninja stickers which will only be available to backers! (International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA)

INSTANT ACCESS + Free T-Shirt - In addition to all of the previous rewards you will receive a free copy of the game at the same time it is released to reviewers! This reward is only available to this backer level and above.

Plus a free Block Ninjas T-shirt! Also get up to 50% off other merchandise of your choice.
(International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA)

FANCY NINJA - FREE HAND PAINTED T-SHIRT- All of the above, but instead of a normal t-shirt you get a free limited edition Hand Painted T-shirt available only to backers. Each one will be one of a kind.\r\nPlus you'll get limited edition art signed by me (size to be determined, but I am are thinking in the realm of 8.5x11).\r\n(International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA)

BE AN EXTRA IN THE GAME - In addition to everything mentioned above, I will create a personalized illustration of YOU, the backer, in the character style of the game. Making you a permanent fixture in the game's universe and featured in a menu section or background of the game along with your name and our thanks. \r\n\r\nPlus the personalized illustration will be printed, framed, signed, and sent to you. (International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA)

YOU ARE A NINJA : BE A PLAYABLE CHARACTER - I will create an alternate version of our hero character (ostensibly a game skin), based on your personalized illustration, as a playable character in game. 

 In addition to this, and all previous rewards, you will also receive lifetime free copies of any future game titles made by me.

Plus the personalized illustration will be printed, framed, signed, and sent to you. (International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA).

If you are local I will deliver this to you and take you out for coffee or lunch to discus the game & futures releases and/or nerd out about other stuff.

A PLACE IN MY HEART - All of the above (including being an in-game character), plus I will personally illustrate an acrylic painting, on a 16x20 canvas, featuring either our hero characters or your personalized illustration character, engaged in bloody combat in similar fashion to the in game art. The painting will be one of a kind and yours to keep. And if you are ever within a 100 mile radius of Albuquerque NM, I will personally drive to meet you, give you a big hug, and take you out for a nice meal.                                                              

+ OFFICIAL BETA TESTER - Yes you can try the IOS games and apps im working on before they come out! Test them out and give feed back and help shape this game and future releases.
Only 5 slots available for the pledge so act fast. Or if your a Ninja master check out the next 2 pledges.

NINJA MASTER! GOD MODE  - Hey you. Yes, you. I see you over there. Standing in the corner of the room, pretending you don't notice me. I know your type. You really love the concept of our game and want to see us succeed, but your deep pockets don't know how they can help. \r\n\r\nWell if you (for some reason) want to back us at this level I will give you all of the previously mentioned backer rewards (including being an in-game character and a painting), but in addition to that you get to have creative input on either this game, or our next, or both. I will meet with you if local or do online chat / meeting and discuss with you creative decisions on a game. In addition to that you will receive numerous high fives and the friendship of everyone involved from now until the end of time.
NINJA MASTER GOD MODE EXTREME - Get everything mentioned below TWICE yes double the awesomeness!  There is only 2 slot available for this pledge are you this extreme?!
